titleStmt.title: A summe of Christian doctrine: composed in Latin, by the R. Father P. Canisius, of the Society of Iesus. With an appendix of the fall of man & iustification, according to the doctrine of the Councel of Trent. Newly translated into Englishe. To which is adioined the explication of certaine questions not handled at large in the booke as shall appeare in the table
Summa doctrinae Christianae. English
titleStmt.author: Canisius, Petrus, Saint, 1521-1597.

titleStmt.title: A summe of Christian doctrine: composed in Latin, by the R. Father P. Canisius, of the Society of Iesus. With an appendix of the fall of man & iustification, according to the doctrine of the Councel of Trent. Newly translated into Englishe. To which is adioined the explication of certaine questions not handled at large in the booke as shall appeare in the table
Summa doctrinae Christianae. English
titleStmt.author: Canisius, Petrus, Saint, 1521-1597.
Garnet, Henry, 1555-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Garnet's first press,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Summa doctrinae Christianae.
Translated in part by Henry Garnet, who also wrote "An exposition of certaine questions not handeled in this booke", p. 486-687.
Identified as STC 4573 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
